title: My Hanukkah
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile 10L
description: My Hanukkah is a simple story that familiarizes students with what they might see during Hanukkah. The vivid illustrations and use of the high-frequency word my make this a perfect choice for early-emergent readers. The story can also be used to teach students how to identify the main idea and details as well as to recognize and use nouns.
reviewWords: bread, candle, family, gift, Hanukkah, toy
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Determine main idea and details
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /k/ sound
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word my
